content:
# After extracting 8 Copper Plates from the furnace, my inventory now includes 8 Copper Plates, along with 10 coal, 6 stone, and 3 Iron Gear Wheels. The furnace still has 4 Copper Ore and 1 Copper Plate left.

# To craft the Assembling Machine 1, I need to ensure I have all the required materials: 9 Iron Plates, 5 Iron Gear Wheels, and 3 Electronic Circuits. 

# Currently, I have 3 Iron Gear Wheels and 8 Copper Plates. I still need to craft more Iron Plates and Iron Gear Wheels.

# First, let's focus on crafting the Iron Plates. I need to gather Iron Ore and smelt it into Iron Plates. 

# I will check my inventory for Iron Ore and gather more if necessary.

iron_ore_quantity = inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronOre, 0)  # Check current Iron Ore in inventory
if iron_ore_quantity < 10:  # If I have less than 10 Iron Ore, I need to gather more
    iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Locate the nearest Iron Ore resource
    move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the Iron Ore resource location
    harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Gather Iron Ore
    print(f"Inventory after gathering iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after gathering Iron Ore

# Now I will smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates using the Stone Furnace. 
# First, I need to ensure I have enough coal to fuel the furnace.

coal_quantity = inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.Coal, 0)  # Check current Coal in inventory
if coal_quantity < 5:  # If I have less than 5 coal, I need to gather more
    coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Locate the nearest Coal resource
    move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the Coal resource location
    harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Gather Coal
    print(f"Inventory after gathering coal: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after gathering Coal

# Now, I will proceed to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates. 
# I will place the Iron Ore into the Stone Furnace and fuel it with Coal.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 coal into the Stone Furnace
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert 10 Iron Ore into the Stone Furnace

# Wait for the smelting process to complete and check the outputs periodically.
for _ in range(30):  # Wait for a maximum of 30 seconds (checking every second)
    sleep(1)  # Wait for the smelting process
    furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)
    if furnace_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 10:  # Check if at least 10 Iron Plates have been produced
        break

# Check the status of the furnace and overall inventory.
print(f"Furnace inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check furnace output
print(f"Inventory after iron smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check overall inventory after smelting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check entities on the map again
